goalDesc: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
targetDesc: Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels, in particular in developing countries, to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime
indicatorDesc: Existence of independent national human rights institutions in compliance with the Paris Principles
seriesDesc: Countries with National Human Rights Institutions and no status with the Paris Principles, C status (1 = YES; 0 = NO)

geo_coverage_countries.geoAreaName: China, Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
